import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './MealItem.module.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlus} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import Minus from '../Minus/Minus' export default function MealItem(props) { const [number, setNumber] = useState(0) let sumPrice const add=()=>{ setNumber(prev =>prev+1) sumPrice += props.item.price props.addSum(props.item, sumPrice) } console.log(sumPrice) const subHandler=()=>{ setNumber(prev =>prev-1) props.subSum(props.item) const newAmount = sumPrice - props.item.price setSumPrice(newAmount) } return (

{props.item.title}

{props.item.desc}

¥ {props.item.price}
{number !==0 && }
) }
